Nuwara Eliya.title: Nuwara Eliya
Nuwara Eliya.byline: Nuwara Eliya is a city in the Hill Country of Sri Lanka.

Nuweiba.title: Nuweiba
Nuweiba.byline: Nuweiba is on the eastern coast of Egypt's Sinai Peninsula, 70 km south of Taba and 180 km north of Sharm el Sheikh, and only 120 km from St. Catherine.
